code: import React from"react";import{useUserStore}from"../stores/users";export var useActiveUser=function useActiveUser(){var activeUserId=useUserStore(function(state){return state.activeUserId;});var users=useUserStore(function(state){return state.users;});return React.useMemo(function(){return users.find(function(user){return user.id===activeUserId;});},[activeUserId,users]);};
